alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
alternative_parents.name: Organic salts

alternative_parents.description: Triorganotin compounds where the tin atom is linked to exactly one alkyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Monoalkyltins

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as hydrocarbon derivatives. These are derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.

direct_parent.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
direct_parent.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
superclass.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives
